  1. Oxford 3000
  2. Oxford 03

Words 201-300

  1. average
    The average temperature in summer is very high.

  2. avoid
    You should avoid eating too much sugar.

  3. award
    She won an award for her excellent work.

  4. aware
    Are you aware of the new rules?

  5. away
    He moved away to a new city last year.

  6. awful
    The food at the restaurant was awful.

  7. baby
    The baby is sleeping in the next room.

  8. back
    He came back from his trip yesterday.

  9. background
    The background of the photo is very beautiful.

  10. backwards
    She walked backwards to avoid stepping on the flowers.

  11. bacteria
    Bacteria can cause many types of diseases.

  12. bad
    The weather was bad, so we stayed inside.

  13. badly
    He played badly in the last game.

  14. bag
    She packed her bag before leaving for school.

  15. bake
    I will bake a cake for the party.

  16. balance
    He lost his balance and fell off the bike.

  17. ball
    The children were playing with a ball in the park.

  18. ban
    The school decided to ban mobile phones during classes.

  19. banana
    I ate a banana for breakfast.

  20. band
    The band played music at the concert.

  21. bank
    She went to the bank to deposit some money.

  22. bar
    They met at a bar near the station.

  23. barrier
    The language barrier made communication difficult.

  24. base
    The base of the tower is very strong.

  25. baseball
    He enjoys playing baseball with his friends.

  26. based
    The movie is based on a true story.

  27. basic
    Learning the basic rules is important.

  28. basically
    Basically, the problem is that we need more time.

  29. basis
    Trust is the basis of a good relationship.

  30. basketball
    She plays basketball every weekend.

  31. bath
    He took a bath after a long day.

  32. bathroom
    The bathroom is at the end of the hall.

  33. battery
    The battery in my phone is almost dead.

  34. battle
    The soldiers fought bravely in the battle.

  35. be
    You should be careful when crossing the road.

  36. beach
    We spent the day relaxing on the beach.

  37. bean
    She added some beans to the soup.

  38. bear
    A bear was spotted near the campsite.

  39. beat
    They worked hard to beat the other team.

  40. beautiful
    The sunset was so beautiful last evening.

  41. beauty
    The beauty of the mountains is breathtaking.

  42. because
    She stayed home because she was feeling sick.

  43. become
    He wants to become a doctor in the future.

  44. bed
    I went to bed early last night.

  45. bedroom
    The bedroom has a large window with a nice view.

  46. bee
    A bee landed on the flower in the garden.

  47. beef
    They cooked beef for dinner.

  48. beer
    He ordered a glass of beer at the bar.

  49. before
    Wash your hands before eating.

  50. beg
    He had to beg for help when he lost his wallet.

  51. begin
    The meeting will begin at 10 a.m.

  52. beginning
    The beginning of the movie was very exciting.

  53. behave
    Please behave well in front of the guests.

  54. behaviour
    His behaviour in class was excellent.

  55. behind
    The car is parked behind the building.

  56. being
    Being kind to others is very important.

  57. belief
    Her belief in hard work helped her succeed.

  58. believe
    I believe that we can solve this problem together.

  59. bell
    The school bell rang at 8 a.m.

  60. belong
    These books belong to the library.

  61. below
    The temperature dropped below zero last night.

  62. belt
    He wore a belt to keep his pants up.

  63. bend
    She had to bend down to pick up the keys.

  64. benefit
    Regular exercise has many health benefits.

  65. bent
    The metal rod was bent after the accident.

  66. best
    She is the best player on the team.

  67. bet
    I bet you will enjoy this movie.

  68. better
    He feels better after taking some rest.

  69. between
    The park is located between the school and the library.

  70. beyond
    The mountains are beyond the river.

  71. bicycle
    He rides his bicycle to work every day.

  72. big
    They live in a big house near the lake.

  73. bike
    She bought a new bike for her son.

  74. bill
    The waiter brought the bill after dinner.

  75. billion
    The company made a billion dollars in profit last year.

  76. bin
    Please throw the trash in the bin.

  77. biology
    She is studying biology at university.

  78. bird
    A bird was singing outside the window.

  79. birth
    The birth of their child brought them great joy.

  80. birthday
    Her birthday is on the 15th of July.

  81. biscuit
    He had a biscuit with his tea.

  82. bit
    She added a bit of sugar to the coffee.

  83. bite
    Be careful, the dog might bite you.

  84. bitter
    The medicine tasted very bitter.

  85. black
    She wore a black dress to the party.

  86. blame
    Don’t blame others for your mistakes.

  87. blank
    He left the answer sheet blank.

  88. blind
    The blind man used a stick to find his way.

  89. block
    The road was blocked due to an accident.

  90. blog
    She writes a blog about her travel experiences.

  91. blonde
    She has long blonde hair.

  92. blood
    The nurse took a sample of his blood for testing.

  93. blow
    The wind began to blow very strongly.

  94. blue
    The sky was clear and blue.

  95. board
    He pinned the notice on the board.

  96. boat
    They went fishing in a small boat.

  97. body
    Exercise is good for your body and mind.

  98. boil
    Please boil some water for tea.

  99. bomb
    The bomb exploded in an empty field.

  100. bond
    They share a strong bond of friendship.
